original: intros m Phi rel_m_Phi. split. - intros [Hx Hy]. unfold andp in Hx. remember (proj1_sig Phi x) as Φx eqn:Heq_Φx. remember (proj1_sig Phi y) as Φy eqn:Heq_Φy. apply andp_elim2 in Hx. apply andp_elim1 in Hy. subst. rewrite Heq_Φx. rewrite Heq_Φy. split; auto. - intros Hxy. unfold andp. remember (proj1_sig Phi x) as Φx eqn:Heq_Φx. remember (proj1_sig Phi y) as Φy eqn:Heq_Φy. apply andp_intro. apply andp_elim1 in Hxy. rewrite <- Heq_Φx. auto. apply andp_elim2 in Hxy. rewrite <- Heq_Φy. auto.
